original: Choose any magical effect within 120ft. The spell that is creating that effect immediately ends (unless the targeted spell is immune to being dispelled). However, this only ends the spellâ€™s effects. It does not undo the effects of the spell. For example, dispelling a Shape Liquid on an affected liquid will only prevent the caster from further manipulating the liquid. It will not unfreeze the liquid or change its shape back to normal.
Point index finger at the target
